page.title: 01HOUSING
page.content: In our area the housing is very mixed. Some of these have been converted into flats which are either rented or privately owned. Others have fallen into disrepair. These are gradually being renovated but some have been demolished. There are also some terraced houses built in the 1930's. There are also blocks of flats in our area. One of these has only recently been completed. Many flats have only two rooms which is a problem for young families. In many cases there are no lifts which is a problem for the elderly. Generally there is a lack of community feeling in this area. This is because many people commute to the centre of London. Often people do not know their neighbours and some people feel isolated and lonely.
